name: Skiddy Minicar Racing
description:
The skid-to-skid gameplay with a touch of skiddy mini race is easy to learn and comes full of new smart challenges.

Complete the stages and unlock new tracks, new appearances and a selection of vehicles that only grows!

Features:

• Simple yet challenging one-touch skidding gameplay!
• Run on several winding tracks!
• A huge collection of insane vehicles to unlock!
• Colorful ways to customize your game!
